means: 煞风景的事，不愉快的事

sentence.Network_en: I don't mean there to be any unpleasantness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我无心引起任何不愉快.

sentence.Network_en: There had to be a reason for the unpleasantness some people habitually displayed.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些人习惯性地行为粗鲁，这一定有其原因。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《综合英语二》整理资料[旺旺英语论坛] ... establish 建立 unpleasantness 不愉快 realistically 实际地.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U2) ... unpleasant 不愉快的 unpleasantness 煞风景的事 unpleasing 不愉快的.
《德伯家的苔丝》第三十四章_新沪江英语网... ... manor 庄园 unpleasantness 不愉快的事 traceable 可追踪的,起源于.

list.abs: The unpleasant experience is all over now ., 不愉快的经历已经过去了.
抗坏血... ... 坏东西 bastard;rogue;scoundrel 坏话 unpleasant talk;malicious words 坏家伙 scoundrel;dirty bastard;bad guy.
A series of unpleasant things happended last week ., 上周发生了一系列不愉快的事情.
A. A Busy... ... vt. cause not to like 使厌恶，使反感 a. very unpleasant 令人厌恶的，令人作呕的 n. woman's shirt 女衬衫.

entry.tran: 令人不快的；令人不舒服的
entry.def: If something is unpleasant, it gives you bad feelings, for example by making you feel upset or uncomfortable.

example.ex: The symptoms can be uncomfortable, unpleasant and serious...
example.tran: 那些症状可能令人不适，很不舒服甚至会比较严重。

example.ex: The vacuum has an unpleasant smell...
example.tran: 那个真空吸尘器有股很难闻的气味。

entry.def: An unpleasant person is very unfriendly and rude.

example.ex: She thought him an unpleasant man...
example.tran: 她认为他是个粗鲁的人。

example.ex: Don't start giving me problems otherwise I'll have to be very unpleasant indeed.
example.tran: 不要开始给我找麻烦，否则我就不客气了。

means.word_mean: 1. the feeling caused by disagreeable stimuli; one pole of a continuum of states of feeling
